name: Sniper Shoot Bottles 3D
description:
Sniper Shoot Bottles 3D is an addictive, time-management, 3d shooting game, where you get to shoot, some amazing bottles placed at different positions and also the moving ones, by keeping the time in mind, using a sniper gun.
FEATURES:
-Different Exciting levels
- Sniper Guns with realistic controls
- Realistic Environment both Indoor and Outdoor
- Best ever User Friendly controls
